bug.short_desc: Scrolling tables using the scroll up and down buttons doesn't work as expected

long_desc.thetext:
If you try scrolling a table using the "up" and "down" buttons above and below the slider, the table does not scroll properly. See your example at http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/demobrowser/#table~Table.html for the behaviour.
You have to cklick the buttons several times to scroll up or down one line of the table.
The problems seemst to be the animation of the scrolling. In the "_animateTo" method of "qx.ui.form.Slider" starts an animation sequence, that never ends. So the on "end" event listener in the "_animateTo" method is never called and the table never scrolls down to its intended position.
Table does have scrolling issues. Maybe this report duplicates bug #9177.

(In reply to comment #1) > Table does have scrolling issues. Maybe this report duplicates bug #9177.
Yes, seems to be the same problem.
